QuestData.Title: In Skilled Hands
QuestData.Description: $n, take these crossbow bolts and then bring them to Hawkmaster Nurong at Farwatch Overlook to the southwest.$B$BNurong is praised among all the Wukao for being a flawless shot. His efforts are credited with holding the line here for these many months. I'm hoping you can work with him and judge for yourself. He may be the final Shado-Pan we need for the hunt.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Shado-Pan Crossbow Bolt Bundle to Hawkmaster Nurong.
QuestData.CompletionText: Another wave of fliers approaches. Be ready.
QuestData.RewardText: There's a lot of movement on the other side of the chasm... something big is coming.
